Title: HOUBA! On the Trail of the Marsupilami
Writer: Alain Chabat (scenario & adaptation), Jeremy Doner (scenario & adaptation), André Franquin (comic)
Actors: Jamel Debbouze, Alain Chabat, Fred Testot, Lambert Wilson
Plot: When reporter Dan Geraldo (Alain Chabat) arrives in Palombia to hunt for a scoop, he never suspects that he is about to make an incredible discovery... With his resourceful local guide ...
